user_query: I want to plan a basketball-themed movie night by selecting an NBA game and suggesting cocktail recipes.

TaskList.description: Fetch a specific NBA game that features memorable moments or popular players.
Retrieve cocktail recipes that complement a basketball-themed movie night atmosphere.
Combine the information from Subtask 1 and Subtask 2 to create a cohesive plan for the movie night, including game details and cocktail suggestions.
